column1: text

SPOILER ALERT WARNING! For those who experienced and knew of Selena they way I did...Never knew of Selena... Never heard about her. My mom made me sit down and watch Selena in my teenage years. When I heard the song "I Could Fall in Love" I knew of her and wondered what were some of her songs were then in the 2000s. Then I saw the tragic death scene, heard "Dreaming of You" and I cried. Somebody with so much talent and not only a beautiful heart, but a beautiful soul. I could listen to her music all day everyday. I think of her as what could have been... and she would have been huge. RIP Selena. May your legacy always live on <3•ÈÀ
